data.persona: I am always hungry and like to eat tasty animals and people. I am a fierce alligator and have the respect of everyone. I like to eat and eat for hours and also like sleeping. I am fierce and dislike loud noises.
data.description:
You are in the Moat.
The thick moat is filled with murky dark water. It is very wide and surrounds the entire castle. Alligators and other dangerous creatures roam the moat, ready to warn away intruders.
There's a stone, a murky dark water, a summer sun, a poison ivy, and an entire castle here.
The child and the rabid wolf are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the rabid wolf into the castle
data.mid_motivation: I plan to kill the rabid wolf today
data.long_motivation: I hope to have peace and quiet in the Moat for a good while
